com.mk4droid.IMC_Core

Class ImageView_Zoom

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.widget.ImageView
        • com.mk4droid.IMC_Core.ImageView_Zoom
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Drawable.Callback, AccessibilityEventSource, KeyEvent.Callback

    public class ImageView_Zoom
extends ImageView
    This is a custom ImageView that also incorporates zoom gestures.
    Author:
    Dimitrios Ververidis for the Multimedia Group (http://mklab.iti.gr).
